description: This Python source file demonstrates how to use multiple MCP servers within an agent, including setup and execution examples.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can execute tasks with tools.

classes.name: MultiMCPTools
classes.description: A class for managing multiple MCP server tools.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronous function to run the agent with a given message, initializing MCP servers and executing the agent.
